entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
